lines.text: I warn you, do not make me do something that I would not do, unless someone made me do it because they didn't do something someone told them to do.
Don't worry Bob, I would never do something to make someone do something to someone, because that someone didn't do something that someone wanted them to do.
I'm glad we understand each other.
...Me too.
Bruno, that's the stupidest idea I've ever heard.
Don't worry, there's plenty of more where that came from...
What's the matter? Did you get your face caught in a zipper?
[Gus Cardinale is hanging in a wire outside a skyscraper when two CIA agents appear at the roof]
Hey, don't try anything stupid down there.
What could be fucking stupider than this?

[motioning to the mess in his apartment]
My maid died.

[smelling the air]
Must've died in here.

[smelling the musty air of Ralph's apartment]
Geeze, Ralph, somebody die in here?
I don't think that's any of your business.
What did you do to my living room?
The same thing you did to your bedroom.

[about the ring]
I wonder what we could get for it.
Oh, 20 years, killed, hunted like deer.

[about the ring]
It's in my safety deposit box.
Good, then we'll go get it.
The bank's closed.
We'll get it tomorrow.
Tomorrow's Saturday, the bank's closed tomorrow.
Banks are OPEN on Saturdays!
Not this one. We can get it Monday.
Monday I'll be in jail!
Who do you think has it?
Um, Elvis?
We checked, he has an alibi.

[about Gus' real name]
Rene? Augustine? Those are girls' names, aren't they?
Not in Switzerland.
[repeated line]
Long live the new Armenian Liberation Party!
[makes crooked little finger sign]
Bruno, I'm sorry for everything mankind has ever done to you!
That's all right... I'm sure they didn't mean it.
